statements: SELECT * FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, comment FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_id, publication_title, suggestion FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE complaint IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE publication_title LIKE '%Health%';
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE reader_id = 3 ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT reader_id, publication_title FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE feedback_id = 2;
SELECT feedback_id, publication_title, suggestion FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE reader_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE publication_title LIKE '%news%' AND complaint IS NOT NULL;
SELECT feedback_id, reader_id, comment FROM PrintMediaFeedback WHERE suggestion != 'N/A';
SELECT * FROM publication_info
SELECT publication_name, publisher FROM publication_info WHERE category = 'Science'
SELECT publication_name, publisher, category FROM publication_info ORDER BY publisher ASC
SELECT reader_id, comment FROM reader_feedback WHERE publication_date > '2023-01-01'
SELECT publication_name, publisher, category FROM publication_info WHERE publisher LIKE '%Press%'
SELECT * FROM reader_feedback WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT publication_name FROM publication_info WHERE publisher = 'New York Times';
SELECT reader_id, publication_name, category FROM reader_feedback JOIN publication_info ON reader_feedback.publication_id = publication_info.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM publication_info ORDER BY publication_name DESC;
SELECT reader_id, COUNT(*) AS comments_count FROM reader_feedback GROUP BY reader_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComments WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT comment_id, comment_text FROM ReaderComments WHERE publication_id = 5;
SELECT reader_id, comment_text FROM ReaderComments WHERE publication_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE publication_id = 3;
SELECT publication_id, complaint_reason FROM Complaints WHERE reader_id = 4;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComments WHERE publication_id = 1 LIMIT 5;
SELECT comment_id, publication_id, reader_id, comment_text FROM Complaints WHERE reader_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_id DESC;
SELECT reader_id, comment_text FROM Suggestions WHERE publication_id = 3 AND reader_id = 4;
SELECT comment_text FROM ReaderComments WHERE publication_id = 5 OR reader_id = 6;
SELECT * FROM Complaints WHERE complaint_reason LIKE '%quality%' ORDER BY complaint_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComments;
SELECT comment_text FROM ReaderComments WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComplaints ORDER BY complaint_id DESC;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Publications WHERE publication_category = 'News';
SELECT suggestion_text FROM ReaderSuggestions WHERE publication_id = 3 AND reader_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComments;
SELECT publication_id, reader_id, comment_text FROM ReaderComments WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT publication_name, publication_type FROM Publications ORDER BY publication_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComplaints WHERE publication_id = 3;
SELECT reader_id, COUNT(*) AS total_comments FROM ReaderComments GROUP BY reader_id;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComments;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM ReaderComments WHERE reader_id = 1;
SELECT publication_title, category FROM Publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT reader_name, email FROM Readers WHERE subscription_status = true;
SELECT reader_name, publication_title FROM Readers JOIN Publications ON Readers.reader_id = Publications.publication_id;
SELECT * FROM ReaderComments WHERE reader_id = 1 ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT publication_title, category FROM Publications WHERE publication_date > '2022-01-01' AND publication_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY publication_date ASC;
SELECT reader_name, email FROM Readers WHERE subscription_status = TRUE;
SELECT suggestion_text FROM Suggestions WHERE publication_id = 3;
SELECT comment_text, comment_date FROM ReaderComments WHERE publication_id = 2 ORDER BY comment_date DESC LIMIT 10;
